decision_conditions: The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no additional windows and doors shall be installed in any elevation of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: RHH EX01, RHH PE01 Rev A, RHH SP01.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Single storey side infill extension; single and two storey side to rear extension; first floor side extension; single and two storey rear extension; alterations to front porch;  alterations and extension to raise height of garage; conversion of garage to habitable room with installation of window to front; rooflights in rear roof slope; external alterations (part demolition of garage and first floor rear balcony)
